posts.post_content:
Looking for some craps money... for sale until Sunday night and then they'll likely go on consignment.  Generally these present much nicer than the technical grade.  Price includes delivery.  Standard paypal preferred.  All backs are clean, but back scans are available on request.

AVAILABLE
Mordecai Brown (Portrait) - P150 - SGC 20 (scratching to image on front) - $125
Johnny Evers (With Bat, Cubs) - P150 - SGC 30 (light wrinkles at top) - $150
Clark Griffith (Portrait) - P150 - SGC 30 (flaking on front) - $100
Nap Lajoie (With Bat) - OM - SGC 30 (very verticle crease through center) - $200
Miller Huggins (Portrait) - P350 - SGC 40 - $125
Iron Man McGinnity - P350 - SGC 40 - $125

SOLD
Jack Chesbro - P150 - SGC 40 
Willie Keeler (Batting) - P150 - SGC 20 (several light wrinkles)
